Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student may be able to draw two cups, though they might not resemble proper designs for a string telephone.
The student may attempt to draw two figures to represent students, but they might not be placed correctly to show communication.
CANNOT: The student is unlikely to draw a connecting string at all, or if they do, it may not be taut (e.g., wavy or disconnected lines).
The student likely does not show any lines or arrows indicating sound traveling through the string or makes them incorrectly (e.g., arrows pointing away from the cups).
